summary: Enhances the colors of glass armor to give it more umph!
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve done a quick and dirty enhancement of glass armor, giving it more of a yellow-green color for the metal, and a more definite green hue for the glass. All the files are here, both male and female!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
            Notice! I have released the enhanced glass weapons file, the wait is over :D (you can find it here http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2168)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
   Installation:
1)Find your skyrim folder
2)Drag and drop the Data folder into your Skyrim folder
3)Merge the folders
Enjoy!

Also, if you liked this, or want a more detailed armor enhancer, check out my Gilded Ebony armor mod; http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1842

New version! v1.1:
In anticipation for the weapon set to come, I have added the shield to this file group (since the shield is located in the armor section). Hope you enjoy it, this should be the final version of the armor.

[IMG]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/1985-1-1322554961.jpg[/IMG]
Edit: I uploaded a version that now supports the nexus mod manager, as well as cleaned out the older versions (since there is no difference)
author: Linkcube

files.name: Female fix
files.changelogHtml: Added fix for the female armor
